allow: Bash(powershell "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName")
Bash(powershell "Stop-Process -Name node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Node processes killed''")
Bash(powershell "if \(Test-Path ''.next''\) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''.next''; Write-Host ''.next folder deleted'' } else { Write-Host ''.next folder not found'' }")
Bash(powershell "Stop-Process -Id 23480 -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Processes killed''")
Bash(powershell "if \(Test-Path ''.next\\dev\\lock''\) { Remove-Item -Force ''.next\\dev\\lock''; Write-Host ''Lock file removed'' } else { Write-Host ''No lock file found'' }")
Bash(powershell "if \(Test-Path ''update-remaining-files.ps1''\) { .\\update-remaining-files.ps1 } else { Write-Host ''Script not found, will update files manually'' }")
